directions: Place the avocados, cocoa powder, maple syrup, lemon juice, vanilla extract, and salt in the work bowl of a food processor, and blend until smooth and creamy. Add water, 1 tablespoon at a time, as needed to make the pudding the desired consistency. Eat right away, or chill and serve cold.
ingredients: 3 ripe avocados - peeled, pitted, and cubed
title: The REAL No-Guilt Chocolate Pudding
